attributes.action: Use the Parlimentary powers of Act Of Attainder to strip Sir Fred Goodwin of his title and property as penalty for High acts prejudicial to the finances, people and commonwealth of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Acts of Attainder were used in former times to punish traitors, i.e. those who grievously harmed the common good and / or the national interest. These powers still exist. Essentially, parliament passes an act declaring the subject a criminal, and enacts a penalty. It is time to resurrect this practice as fitting for those who have so massively damaged our national interest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
